content: Just in case anyone is at DevDays and wants to come watch the Raptors win the NBA Championship (basketball) tonight, I'll mention that @Melanie Yeung and I are gonna find a bar after the day's festivities. If anyone wants to join, let me know.
Update: We have a reservation at Redmond's bar and Grill in downtown redmond (looks like it's a 10 min drive/uber from here). All are welcome to join!

The victory parade... if anyone is interested :p
